item.description: Update Confined Space Rescue; INC#1473; 10:50PM; EB 210 Fwy x Hubbard; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B9e1Sv; Sylmar; Two LAFD confined-space rescuers made entry, descended through the shaft (supported above by the aerial ladder), and searched over 100 feet in each direction. Thankfully, no victims were found.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E275 E288 E289 E298 E88 E91 EM15 HR3 PI4 RA75 RA889 RA91 T75 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Confined Space Rescue; INC#1473; 08:50PM; EB 210 Fwy x Hubbard; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B9e1Sv; Sylmar; LAPD and CHP are on scene where they received *reports of* two deceased persons at least 20 feet down a maintenance hole in the ground. Due to the nature of the space and entry portal, LAFD Confined Space Rescue Specialists will don special equipment and make entry to investigate, consistent with industry regulations. There is still no visual confirmation of patients. The confined space entry will allow an underground investigation into this reported emergency.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E275 E288 E289 E298 E88 E91 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA889 RA91 T75 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1415; 09:19PM; 8232 S Delgany Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LBNlPi; Playa del Rey; A well-established fire spread from the one-story attached garaged and burned through much of the second story and the entire attic of the two-story home. It took 61 firefighters 64 minutes to fully extinguish the flames. The fire was confined to the building of origin. One occupant complained of minor burns and was treated and released on scene. One firefighter was injured by falling debris from above, and was also treated and released (to continue working) on scene. Sadly, one feline pet is in grave condition, with firefighters performing resuscitative measures. The cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM42 E205 E263 E266 E27 E288 E295 E5 E58 E62 E67 EA1 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA5 RA62 RA867 RA95 T5 T63 T66 T88 T95 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1415; 08:15PM; 8227 S Delgany Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KwCEw8; Playa del Rey; Two-story single-family home with heavy fire showing from the attached garage. Offensive mode.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E5 E67 RA5 RA867 T5 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0366; 07:58AM; 1532 S Hi Point St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vv2YCz; Mid-City; It took 48 firefighters 20 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in the vacant home. Firefighters used forcible entry operations to overcome previous security measures. Nearby buildings were spared and no injuries reported. Cause under investigation.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E261 E292 E294 E58 E61 EM11 RA58 RA61 RA858 RA892 T26 T61 T92 T94; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0366; 07:38AM; 1532 S Hi Point St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vv2YCz; Mid-City; Vacant single-family home (site of previous burn) with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E261 E292 E294 E58 E61 EM11 RA58 RA61 RA858 RA892 T26 T61 T92 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1419; 07:16PM; 10708 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F2t5DZ; Broadway-Manchester; It took 26 firefighters 16 minutes to extinguish the flames, confining the damage to the one under-construction commercial building. No reported injuries.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC13 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA264 RA865 SQ21 T33 T64; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1419; 07:00PM; 10708 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F2t5DZ; Broadway-Manchester; One-story commercial building under construction (site of previous burn) with fire showing. Test Only; INC#0023; 12:00AM; 100 W 5th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vtI6Mb; Downtown; Testing LAFD's emergency incident alerting system. No action required.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; T9; CH7; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0858; 01:21PM; 105 N Fickett St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KmwUFa; #BoyleHeights; Address *Corrected* to Fickett Street. 85 LAFD Firefighters assigned in offensive firefighting operations at a one story residential duplex with a common attic, took just 27 minutes to access, confined and fully extinguish stubborn flames. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 BC2 BC5 CM22 EA1 EA2 E1 E17 E201 E202 E203 E209 E211 E25 E27 E9 EM11 EM25 HR3 RA10 RA25 RA803 SQ21 T1 T11 T2 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey
